forumNotes.author: was_jaclaz
forumNotes.content:
chrisfo, please DO NOT post on an existing unrelated thread.  
EITHER post on a related thread OR start a new one  
> is possible to add aportable apps of my own into a live cd?

Yes. ![:drunk:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/drunk.gif)   
[http://homepages.tes...no-answers.html](http://homepages.tesco.net/J.deBoynePollard/FGA/questions-with-yes-or-no-answers.html "External link")  

You need to give DETAILS on what you are asking, if you want a proper answer, please do check the "common sense advice" attached to Rules:  
[http://www.boot-land...?act=boardrules](http://www.boot-land.net/forums/index.php?act=boardrules "External link")  

WHICH live CD?  
Based on WHICH Operating System?  
WHICH app?  
WHAT do you mean by "of my own"?  

jaclaz
